info.title: Rewrite API
info.summary: Projects API reference (Projects, API Keys, Templates, Webhooks).
info.description:
Complete public reference for project-level endpoints in Rewrite API v1.

All endpoints return a consistent envelope (`ok`, `data`, and optional `cursor`).
Use either bearer token (API key) with scopes or authenticated cookie session.

tags.name: API Keys
tags.description: Create, list, and revoke project API keys.

tags.name: Templates
tags.description: Manage reusable SMS templates with variables.

tags.name: Webhooks
tags.description: Register and manage delivery event webhooks.

patch.description: Update mutable project fields such as `name`. Requires `project:write` scope for API keys.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PATCH');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"name":"Marketing Alerts"}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"name\":\"Marketing Alerts\"}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val body = "{\"name\":\"Marketing Alerts\"}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("PATCH", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
x-codeSamples.source:
let url = URL(string: "https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368")!
var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "PATCH"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"name\":\"Marketing Alerts\"}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

x-codeSamples.label: C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PATCH 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\
  -d '{"name":"Marketing Alerts"}'

delete.description: Permanently deletes the project and associated resources. Owner-only operation.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'DELETE',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
    },
)
print(response.json())

x-codeSamples.label: Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
]);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Delete.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("DELETE", null)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X DELETE 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'

get.description:
Returns active API keys for the project using cursor pagination.

Use `limit`, `after`, and `before` for pagination.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'GET',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
    },
)
print(response.json())

x-codeSamples.label: Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'GET');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
]);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("GET", null)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X GET 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'

post.description: Creates a project API key and returns the secret once. Store it securely.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'POST');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"name":"Jobs worker","scopes":["project:templates:read","projects:webhooks:read"]}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"name\":\"Jobs worker\",\"scopes\":[\"project:templates:read\",\"projects:webhooks:read\"]}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val body = "{\"name\":\"Jobs worker\",\"scopes\":[\"project:templates:read\",\"projects:webhooks:read\"]}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("POST", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
x-codeSamples.source:
let url = URL(string: "https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys")!
var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"name\":\"Jobs worker\",\"scopes\":[\"project:templates:read\",\"projects:webhooks:read\"]}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

x-codeSamples.label: C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\
  -d '{"name":"Jobs worker","scopes":["project:templates:read","projects:webhooks:read"]}'

delete.description: Revokes an API key immediately by key id.

Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'DELETE',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/api-keys/748395130237498400',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
    },
)
print(response.json())

value.name: order_shipped
value.content: Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.

post.description: Creates a reusable template with variables and fallback values.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'POST');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"name":"order_shipped","content":"Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"name\":\"order_shipped\",\"content\":\"Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val body = "{\"name\":\"order_shipped\",\"content\":\"Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("POST", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
x-codeSamples.source:
let url = URL(string: "https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates")!
var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"name\":\"order_shipped\",\"content\":\"Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

x-codeSamples.label: C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\
  -d '{"name":"order_shipped","content":"Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}'

patch.description: Partially updates template content and/or variables.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:

]);

delete.description: Deletes a template from the project.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'DELETE',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
    },
)
print(response.json())

x-codeSamples.label: Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'DELETE');

post.description: Creates a webhook endpoint and event subscriptions.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'POST',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/webhooks',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    },
    json={
      "name": "Delivery events",
      "endpoint": "https://example.com/webhooks/rewrite",
      "events": [
        "sms.queued",
        "sms.delivered",
        "sms.failed"
      ]
    },
)
print(response.json())

bearerAuth.description: Send your API key as `Authorization: Bearer <api-key>`.

after.name: after
after.description: Unique cursor ID to fetch items after this value.

before.name: before
before.description: Unique cursor ID to fetch items before this value.

Snowflake.description: Unique resource identifier in snowflake format.

persist.description: Whether another page can be requested using `next`.

next.description: Cursor to request the next page (`after`).

ok.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

data.description: No data is returned for this response.

OkEmptyResponse.description: Successful response. This endpoint does not return any data.

icon.description: Set to `null` to remove icon (when supported).

ProjectUpdateBody.description: Fields that can be updated in a project.

APIKey.description: Project API key metadata (secret is never returned again).

ok.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

data.description: Primary response payload for this operation.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor information for fetching the next page.

name.description: Human-readable name used to identify this API key.

scopes.description: Permission scopes granted to this API key.

APIKeyCreateBody.description: Create a project API key with optional scopes.

ok.description: Indicates whether the API key was created successfully.

id.description: ID of the newly created API key.

key.description: One-time secret API key value. Store it securely; it will not be shown again.

data.description: Details returned once after API key creation.

APIKeyCreateResponse.description: Creation response containing the one-time secret key.

name.description: Variable key used by your app.

fallback.description: Default value when your payload does not provide the variable.

TemplateVariable.description: Named variable used in a template body.

name.description: Human-readable name used to identify this API key.

Template.description: Template metadata and optional content snapshot.

AuthScope.description:
Permission scope accepted by API keys. Use scoped permissions whenever possible.

Common values:
- `project:read`
- `project:write`
- `project:api_keys:read`
- `project:templates:read`
- `project:templates:write`
- `projects:webhooks:read`
- `projects:webhooks:write`
- `projects:payments:read`
- `*` (full access)
